QuestData.Title: The Beating of Troll Drums
QuestData.Description: Do you hear that, $c? The beating of war drums in the distance. The Zandalari are preparing for us.$b$bLet's not give them the luxury of time to organize their defenses. We need to push the attack now!$b$bReport to Scout Captain Elsia within Conqueror's Terrace. She will have further orders for you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Locate Scout Captain Elsia within Conqueror's Terrace.
